nodes.text: A Human male worked on Coruscant during the Clone Wars as a power generator engineer. He was killed in an attack on the Coruscant power generator.

Around 21 BBY, there was a debate raged in the Galactic Senate on whether to deregulate the banks to finance the creation of more clones or not. In a bid to sway the votes in their favor, Separatist Head of State, Count Dooku tasked his droid commander, General Grievous, to transfer his demolition droids to Coruscant to blow up the power generator and scare the senators into voting for deregulation. When the droids attacked the compound, the engineer was in conversation with a fellow colleague, and was surprised to see the sweeper droids appear as the engineers did not schedule a cleaning for that day. He and the rest of the engineers were killed when the droids secured the power generator.
